name: Gorilla Fighting City
description:
Gorilla Fighting City in the crazy city and attacking on everything in this wild gorilla simulator control your ultimate gorilla and attack on the citizens and dominate the city. Become the ultimate hunter as the real jungle beast gorilla simulator 3d and attack your prey with your big punch to survive in the city.
Feature
• Realistic gorilla simulations with fantasy 3D crazy city.
• Multiple gorillas to choose for ultimate gorilla games 3D.
• Realistic and thrilling gorilla sound.
• Easy, Smooth and addictive game play
• Multiple action packed missions
• Stunning 3D graphics and city environment
